subject:
TopCoder(R) Single Round Match sponsored by AOL(R) - $5,000 Prize
 Purse!!
body:
Hello sm1lies,

TopCoder(R) Single Round Match 345 is scheduled for Wednesday, April 18 at 11:00 AM Eastern Daylight Time (UTC/GMT -4 hours).

Please be sure to check here for the start time in your time zone:
http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?day=18&month=4&year=2007&hour=11&min=00&sec=0&p1=179

* $5,000 in SRM prizes, provided by AOL, will be given away during this match
* Registration will begin at 8:00 AM and will end at 10:55 AM Eastern Daylight Time
* Allowable programming languages are Java, C++, Microsoft(R) Visual
C#(R) .NET, and Microsoft Visual Basic(R) .NET
* TopCoder Administrators will be available in the Admin Lobby Room to answer questions
* For more details click here: 
http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=MatchDetails&rd=10669

------------------------------------------------------

SRM 345 is sponsored by AOL.  Prior to the round join representatives from AOL in the Arena to discuss Boxely(TM). What is Boxely?  Find out more here and don't forget to log in for the chat!  http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=features&d2=041707

AOL, the world's largest online community, has opened its doors and is inviting you, the developer, in.  For more information on AOL's APIs, tools and documentation that will allow you to hijack and mash up a number of AOL products and services, including AIM, go to http://dev.aol.com. AOL is also ready for you to give them the opportunity to make your career aspirations come true.  For information on job opportunities, go to:  http://www.topcoder.com/tc?module=Static&d1=tournaments&d2=tco07&d3=sponsorspatrons&d4=aol

------------------------------------------------------

Best of luck to you in the Arena!

- The TopCoder Competitions Team

===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder competitions.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, login to www.topcoder.com/tc and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your TopCoder profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of TopCoder emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.

www.topcoder.com
